title: Talk Talk - the 2 heroin albums [UK IMPORTS]
description:
Talk Talk - the 2 heroin albums [UK IMPORTS] 192 kbps

The 80&#039;s group Talk Talk indulged in 2 legendary and exclusive heroin-induced studio sessions that resulted in the albums "Laughing Stock" and "Spirit of Eden."  They seem to defy genre, but are rife with jazz licks and pre-shoegaze haze the likes of which are addictive like nothing else you&#039;ve ever heard.  They go in and out of print and are hard to find outside of the UK, so snag it now-- these albums are FANTASTIC!

Album 1 (c. 1988): Talk Talk - Spirit of Eden
1. The Rainbow - Eden - Desire
2. Inheritance
3. I Believe In You
4. Wealth


Album 2 (c. 1991): Talk Talk - Laughing Stock
1. Myrrhman
2. Ascension Day
3. After the Flood
4. Taphead
5. New Grass
6. Runeii
